abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York draws funds to help Charles Daubek Jr of Hastings-on-Hudson in Westchester County pay his heating bill.
lead_paragraph: Even with his savings gone, Charles Daubek Jr. still lives in the Westchester County house his parents bought in 1944.

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Despite Hard Times, Veteran Still Lives Independently
headline.seo: Helping a World War II Veteran Live Independently
headline.print_headline: Despite Hard Times, Veteran Still Lives Independently
